main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified objects in Ogden, Utah during November 1954.
interesting points: First sighting on 13 November 1954 described a brilliant oblong object with a fiery trail., Second sighting on 18 November 1954 noted a white object with a tail observed through a window., Length of observations varied between 1 to 2 seconds., Different sources classified the sightings as probable meteors., Observers reported seeing objects that displayed unusual movement and trails.
sighted object: brilliant oblong object and white object with tail
witness description: Observer standing in front of home at 4137 Monroe St, Ogden, using binoculars
